title: Tapen's Guide to not Being a Useless Nigger
description:
This shitty collection of poorly put-together files is my gift to mankind (other than AIDS)

Contained within is everything interesting, creative, funny, unique, or offensive in such a unique way, that I have decided to download.

Shot list of its contents:

-massive collection of how-tos and general knowledge on a wide variety of topics
-several funny flash animations and songs that only a nigger could love
-swedish, german, icelandic and russian basic language lessons
-some general copypasta
-huge-ass collection of 4chan image reactions
-A shit ton of 4chan-tier funny shit and general offensive pictures and comics.
-way fucking more






Use freely, just credit me and other content creators who created this.


~Tapen
